title: User Sign Up with Valid Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with a valid email and password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Input a valid email address
Input a valid password meeting security requirements
Submit the sign-up form
Verify that sign-up is successful and user is redirected to dashboard or onboarding

title: User Sign In with Correct Credentials
description: Check that users can log in successfully with correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page
Enter a registered email
Enter the correct password
Submit the login form
Verify successful authentication and access to the dashboard

title: User Sign In with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login fails and proper error message is displayed when a wrong password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page
Enter a registered email
Enter an incorrect password
Submit the login form
Verify login fails and error message about invalid credentials is shown

title: Access Denied to Dashboard without Authentication
description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot access the Dashboard and are redirected to sign-in page.

steps.description: Attempt to directly navigate to the dashboard URL without logging in
Verify user is redirected to the sign-in page

title: Access Denied to Dashboard with Expired Subscription
description: Verify that users with expired or inactive subscription cannot access Dashboard and see appropriate messaging.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials but inactive subscription
Attempt to access dashboard page
Verify access denied and redirected to subscription or trial page with message

title: Create New Document from Dashboard
description: Ensure users can create a new document successfully from the dashboard, and it appears in the list.

steps.description: Login with valid subscription and open dashboard
Click on 'Create New Document' button
Enter a document name or accept default
Confirm creation
Verify the new document appears in the dashboard list
Verify the new document is empty and ready for editing

title: Delete Document from Dashboard
description: Verify that a user can delete a document from the dashboard and it no longer appears in the document list afterwards.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard with existing documents
Initiate delete action on a document
Confirm the deletion in the confirmation dialog
Verify the document is removed from the dashboard list

title: Auto-Save Document Content While Editing
description: Check that the document content is automatically saved to backend within 1 second of changes.

steps.description: Open a document in the editor
Make edits to the document content (add text, format text)
Verify auto-save triggers and persists changes in backend within 1 second
Refresh the document page
Verify document content reflects the saved changes

title: Edit Document Title Inline
description: Validate that users can click the document title in the editor and edit it inline with changes saved.

steps.description: Open a document in the editor
Click on the document title field
Change the title text
Finish editing (blur or press enter)
Verify that the new title is saved and displayed

title: Rich Text Editor Formatting Tools Functionality
description: Verify all rich text formatting options including bold, italic, headings, lists, and code blocks work as intended.

steps.description: Open a document in the editor
Type sample text
Apply bold formatting and verify visually
Apply italic formatting and verify visually
Apply various heading levels and verify appearance
Create ordered and unordered lists and verify structure
Insert code blocks and verify formatting
Verify rendering reflects applied formatting correctly and content saves properly

title: Knowledge Sidebar: Add New Knowledge Item
description: Ensure users can add a new knowledge item with title and content linked to the current document.

steps.description: Open a document in the editor
Open the Knowledge Sidebar
Click 'Add Knowledge Item' button
Input title and content for the knowledge item
Submit the new knowledge item
Verify knowledge item is listed in the sidebar and saved in backend

title: Knowledge Sidebar: Edit Existing Knowledge Item
description: Verify that users can edit title and content of existing knowledge items and the changes persist.

steps.description: Open a document with existing knowledge items
Open Knowledge Sidebar
Select a knowledge item and edit its title and content
Save the changes
Verify updated knowledge item is saved and displayed correctly

title: Knowledge Sidebar: Delete Knowledge Item
description: Verify that knowledge items can be deleted and are removed from the list and backend.

steps.description: Open Knowledge Sidebar with existing knowledge items
Initiate delete action for a knowledge item
Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog
Verify knowledge item is removed from list and no longer accessible

title: Add Selected Text as AI Context Snippet
description: Verify that selected text in the editor can be added as context snippet for AI chat with management control UI.

steps.description: Open a document in the editor
Select a portion of text
Use context menu or button to add selection as AI snippet
Verify snippet appears as a visual pill in AI Chat Sidebar
Remove the snippet via UI controls
Verify snippet is removed from chat context

title: AI Chat Sidebar Provides Context-Aware Responses
description: Validate AI assistant in chat sidebar delivers responses influenced by document content, knowledge items, and user AI instructions.

steps.description: Open a document with content and knowledge items
Open AI Chat Sidebar
Send a query to the AI assistant
Verify AI response reflects context from document, knowledge, and instructions
Insert AI-generated text into the document
Verify inserted AI text appears correctly in the editor

title: Global AI Instructions Applied from Profile Settings
description: Verify that global AI assistant instructions set in profile settings are applied during AI chat interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile Settings page
Set or modify global AI instructions
Save profile settings
Open AI Chat Sidebar in any document
Send a query to AI assistant
Confirm AI behavior includes global instructions in its response

title: Override AI Instructions with Document-Specific Settings
description: Ensure document-specific AI instructions override global settings for the AI chat in that document.

steps.description: Open a document and set specific AI instructions
Save document-specific AI instructions
Open AI Chat Sidebar for that document
Send a query to AI assistant
Verify AI response respects document-specific AI instructions instead of global ones

title: Subscription Trial Flow Handling
description: Test that new users can access trial subscription, see trial duration, and transition to paid plans smoothly.

steps.description: Create a new user and login
Verify trial page is presented with trial details
Complete trial signup or upgrade via checkout
Verify successful subscription upgrade and access to full features

title: Subscription Checkout Flow
description: Verify that the payment checkout flow via Polar.sh works correctly and updates subscription status accordingly.

steps.description: Login with trial or free user
Navigate to subscription upgrade page
Enter payment details and submit
Verify successful payment and updated subscription status is reflected in the app

title: Protected Routes Enforce Authentication and Subscription
description: Test route guards to ensure only authenticated users with valid subscription access dashboard, editor, and profile pages.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard without login
Verify redirect to sign-in page
Login with expired subscription
Attempt to access editor
Verify redirect to subscription or trial page
Login with active subscription
Access dashboard, editor, and profile pages
Verify full access granted

title: Update User Profile Name and Email
description: Verify users can edit their name and email in Profile Settings and changes persist after saving.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile Settings page
Modify the user name field
Modify the email field
Save changes
Verify updated name and email are saved and displayed

title: Real-Time Synchronization of Documents
description: Test real-time sync for documents when multiple clients edit the same document simultaneously.

steps.description: Open the same document on two different clients logged in with the same user
Make edits in client A
Verify changes appear in real-time in client B
Make edits in client B
Verify changes appear in real-time in client A

title: UI Components Conform to Design System
description: Validate critical UI components such as buttons, cards, inputs, and dialogs adhere to design specifications for consistency.

steps.description: Load pages containing buttons, cards, inputs, and confirmation dialogs
Verify fonts, colors, spacing, border radii, and hover/focus states match style guide
Verify components behave correctly on different screen sizes and devices

title: Account Dropdown Navigates to Profile and Supports Sign Out
description: Ensure account dropdown menu allows navigation to profile settings and signing out logs user out.

steps.description: Login and open account dropdown menu in header
Select 'Profile Settings' option
Verify navigation to Profile Settings page
Open account dropdown again
Click 'Sign Out' option
Verify user is logged out and redirected to sign-in or landing page

title: Clear AI Chat Sidebar Message History
description: Verify that users can clear the AI chat history and the chat UI resets accordingly.

steps.description: Open AI Chat Sidebar and send several messages
Use the clear chat history control
Verify all previous messages are removed from UI and chat state
